explains: n. 霓虹灯；氖（10号元素，符号 Ne）
wordGroup: neon sign n. 霓虹灯（广告牌）

sentences.en: A neon sign flashed on and off above the door.
sentences.cn: 门上方霓虹灯忽明忽暗地闪烁着。

sentences.en: Inert gases like neon and argon have eight electrons in their outer shell.
sentences.cn: 像氖和氩这样的惰性气体，在它们的外电子层有8个电子。

sentences.en: Its neon displays have a retro feel and saxophone jazz eases from the speakers.
sentences.cn: 它的霓虹灯给人一种复古的感觉，萨克斯爵士乐从扬声器里舒缓地传出。
